data.actual_result: The input is granted to the search bar, allowing you to use it like normal.
data.expected_result: The current modal reads the input, and does nothing with it.
data.short_description: You can use the Search bar if another modal/sub-window is on screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a popup modal.  The easiest way to do that is to either upload a file, or hit Ctrl-/ to bring up the Keyboard Combos menu. - Press Ctrl-F.
